             (EN)	Simple Wii Series Vol. 4: The Shooting Action

Low price and simple game rules for the production of Simple series landed fourth principle works Wii Platform for is a shooting game , players use the left stick to control character movement in the game, the right stick controls aiming and shooting direction . Although the number of games played and the " Geometry Wars " is somewhat similar , but this made the new " capacity building system " and the consumption of energy "special attack" makes fun of the game has also been improved .

The model is also more abundant game , players can be one on one with the computer "singled out mode" or with friends , " Battle Mode" between up to four people . In addition, you can also use Wi-Fi Connection, for online play against the world.
